import React from "react"; import PoolBar from "../components/cards/bars/PoolBar.js" import Layout from '../components/layout/Layout.js'; export default class DnaHomeSection extends React.Component { render() { return (

DNA Protocol

Users pool their resources to mitigate risk and to optain high value NFTs.

Acquire

Users contribute to the purchase of a NFT. Once the sellers price is met, a series of smart contract interactions purchase and put the NFT on Sale.

Sell

Once the NFT is sold through the proceeds are distributed to the owners in proportion to their contribution.

Mitigation

If the NFT does not sell for the purposed price after one year, the price will be lowered to the original purchase price for an additional year.

Award

If the NFT has not sold after two years. The NFT will be awarded to one of the owners through a random number generation that has been weighted proportionally to the owner’s contribution.

); } }
